players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I believe we should focus on finding out who among us is the detective. If we can identify them, it would give us valuable information and potentially help us eliminate a mafioso."
Diana: "I think we should all consider the possibility that one of us was killed last night. As a precaution, let's share any strange dreams or suspicions we might have had during the night."
Charlie: "Let's focus on finding out who the mafioso is. We can't afford to waste time speculating about my identity."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
